title: Imagine that.

> [{quoted}](name=Num Num,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WWB2twRT,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-09-09T01:54:55.519+0000)
>

the h8turs just came to b00li. 

On topic, its really not hard to believe a graves - the poster child of over powered junglers right now - would be toxic. Not only is he a marksman, hes a VERY powerful marksman.

Conduct for boards - if you got something useful to say... say it respectfully. If you don't care... great - nobody is forcing you to read that board or post so bugger off and go elsewhere. Nobody cares if you specifically like a post, hate it, or feel any other emotion (or lack of) towards it. Don't waste people's time and board space with such useless posts.
Lmaooooo thats just awful damage from a champ who only brings damage lol

looks like a obvious 15min surrender given everyone elses damage compared to Sorakas.
So...a jungler who is losing, isn't neccisarily going to have a lot of damage dealt. He isn't laning thus does not have constant uptime on dealing champ damage.
He was probably farming, and getting gibbed in his jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=PhearBunny,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WWB2twRT,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-09-08T00:41:15.313+0000)

> looks like a obvious 15min surrender given everyone elses damage compared to Sorakas.
> So...a jungler who is losing, isn't neccisarily going to have a lot of damage dealt. He isn't laning thus does not have constant uptime on dealing champ damage.
> He was probably farming, and getting gibbed in his jungle.

Nope, wasn't a 15 min surrender, i was the one who wanted to ff, which was before the entire situation started.
He had as much time to fight as everyone else did, as me(raka) and mf adc constantly went to help him do whatever it is he wanted, whether it be invade, help him from an invade, whatever.

I like the assumption without asking what happened though, considering you were pretty far off with your assumptions with how the match was going.


When your only job is to output damage, or control objectives, you should be able to do that when you have multiple winning lanes that are rotating to help him, no excuses.

okay well, your entire team was garbage than if were going by damage done.

Looks like you were too focused on your KDA or damaging the enemy rather than winning.

You were ~~trying to keep everyone alive while sitting in the back~~ with a rank 1 W until level 8. You max Starecall, prioritizing it over W the entire game. W was secondary to you. Her Q requires her to go up close to the enemies. You were hardly in the back.

M7 Soraka here.

Don't give me bullshit. I know lies when I see them.

but hey, you dumbasses flock in a pack :)

> [{quoted}](name=Num Num,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WWB2twRT,comment-id=00040000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-09-09T17:33:19.208+0000)

Get your victim mentality a better boost next time. Preferably without having evidence against the contrary by even the riot servers themselves. You got caught lying through your teeth. Get over it. It happens.

> [{quoted}](name=Num Num,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WWB2twRT,comment-id=0004000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-09-09T17:40:53.879+0000)

I posted a link with evidence. If you write a letter in blood and I do DNA testing and it says it's your blood, it's still your blood. The video would show the same. I don't need to look at it. Graves was literally the only one who took a tower. Minions came second.

The link says you maxed Q first. Yeah, some Soraka healer backliner you were.

Keep your denial in your head. Nobody cares about your victim complex.

If you want to look worse, I can look into all your Soraka games and pick out every single flaw you did.

> [{quoted}](name=Lakrosin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WWB2twRT,comment-id=00040000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-09-09T17:54:39.715+0000)

And yes, i maxed Q first, as i was always the priority target, so the more i could heal myself to heal everyone else, the better.

Are you sure you play soraka? this should be common knowledge to anyone who plays raka.


Oh, you're silver 5 and losing alot too. I doubt you know anything about what you're talking about.


So, i'll repeat this one last time, LOOK at the VIDEO evidence, or get out of here with your 0 knowledge and failure to abuse fiddle support outside of bots like you've been trying to do.

Ur mum Graves

Also, to the forum mod, Ulanopo, thats deleted comments, you can fuck off too.

;)

The ones that talk the biggest game and the most shit instead of just DOING it tend to be the most boosted.

I'm not referring to if someone is shotcalling and making good macro decisions, I'm talking the guy who says in champ select, just give me gank and I solo carry or I will 1v5 this game so just sit back and farm boys. I'm actually plat/diamond smurf. I'm Faker guys - so just listen to me and we win. Stuff like that is almost always a sure sign they're anything but...

I just ignore them, expect the worst and hope for better while focusing on doing what I need to do. Now if they start inting and blaming me, I do tend to tell them why and how completely and utterly wrong they are.
Spent so much time typing that Graves forgot to play the game
